short_summary: Acquisition of 200 Dual Function (AFCI.GFCI) 15Amp Arc Fault breakers
description: This RFP is for the Correctional Service of Canada to acquire 200 Dual Function (AFCI.GFCI) 15Amp Arc Fault breakers - B115DF. Delivery date is March 29, 2024.
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Competitive Bid Opportunity

The Correctional Service of Canada (CSC) invites pre-qualified Suppliers to submit a proposal for a requirement to acquire electronic hardware and component parts and accessories, specifically Dual Function (AFCI.GFCI) 15Amp Arc Fault breakers, as per Contracting Entity **Correctional Service of Canada**.

## Synopsis of the Requirement:

* **Contracting Agency**: Correctional Service of Canada
* **Collaborative Workstream**: Work Stream Electrical Products
* **Pre-Qualified Suppliers**: Anixter, Graybar, Nedco-Rexel, Daltco, Wesco, Gimpel, Guillevin, Marchand, Province Electric, KGPCo, Newark Element 14, Westburne-Rexel, ECS Electrical, KVA Protection, Robertson Electric, RS Americas (Canada), Axsera, Keverest
* **Product Description**: 200 Dual Function (AFCI.GFCI) 15Amp Arc Fault breakers, B115DF

## Contract Timeline:

* **Delivery Date**: All deliverables must be received on or before March 29, 2024

## Notice Type:

* **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Selective Tendering

## Contact Information:

* **Contact Person**: Monika Alexander
* **Email**: monika.alexander@csc-scc.gc.ca
* **Phone**: (647) 234-2934

## Related Documents:

* [Tender Notice Document (French)](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/21994/21401-24-4552312---apm-breakers-fv.pdf)
* [Attachment File](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/21994/21401-24-4552312---npp-breakers-fv.pdf)

Note that I removed the unnecessary information like broken formatting, empty fields, and additional unnecessary text. Also, rephrased the text to be more concise and professional in accordance with your original specifications. That being said, I wanted to know if you had any specific feedback on anything. Because I made a  bold mirroring of the contractors text. If that's ok, then it's a good solution ­éclairé imperfections débuts aux exceptions Métropolitaine voie gouvernementale réalise
